email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - mv OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

We are pleased to offer mv OCEAN BREEZE (DWT: 150,000, LOA: 280m) for your 12,000MT steel coils shipment from Busan to Los Angeles. Starting freight quote is USD 45.50 per ton on CIF terms. Laycan is 15-20 November. Demurrage rate is USD 25,000 per day.

Kind regards,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - mv OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market levels. Can you revise to USD 42.00 per ton?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - mv OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

We can offer USD 43.50 per ton, which is our best rate given the current market conditions. Let me know if this works for you.

Kind regards,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - mv OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

USD 43.50 is still higher than our budget. Can you do USD 42.50? Also, can we extend the laycan to 18-23 November?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - mv OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

We can agree to USD 42.50 per ton and adjust the laycan to 18-23 November. Please confirm your acceptance.

Kind regards,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - mv OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Confirmed at USD 42.50 per ton. Please send the recap.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Recap - Freight Offer for Steel Coils - mv OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Here is the recap of our agreement:
- Vessel: mv OCEAN BREEZE
- Cargo: 12,000MT Steel Coils
- Load Port: Busan
- Discharge Port: Los Angeles
- Laycan: 18-23 November
- Freight: USD 42.50 per ton
- Demurrage: USD 25,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm.

Kind regards,
Sarah Connor
